name: Sittin on Our Porch - QueenEarth and Sketchygg
description:
Sittin on Our Porch - QueenEarth and Sketchygg

I often sit on my porch and think. Drink coffee. 
Write. Talk to friends. Watch my dog watch the alley cats 
in the city streets.

My wife comes out to check on me and check in with me. 
This is her view when she comes outside. 
Day or night. 

She drew the original on her iphone, from her own photograph.
She colored it. We worked our brains through the animation aspects.

This collab was inspired by the lofi instrumentals that filled our home during the pandemic. The ones that inspired the art and instrumentals we share in the metaverse. 

Featuring the instrumental “Piano Lesson” by QueenEarth

Written by M Smith
Recorded and Mixed by QueenEarth
All vocals by QueenEarth
Composed and arranged by QueenEarth
Bass and vocal percussion by QueenEarth
Artwork and animation by SKetchygg

NFT owner has the right to resell the music and art NFT,
to publicly perform and publicly display the art.

Owner may not reproduce, prepare derivatives, or distribute copies,
without the consent of and credit to the original creator.
